function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, including regular testing and sanitation procedures, for individuals involved in mutual aid groups.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enhance outreach and support services for at-risk groups, improve access to healthcare, and prioritize vaccination programs for vulnerable populations.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invest in data infrastructure and analytics, strengthen international collaboration on disease surveillance, and develop contingency plans for global connectivity challenges.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing measures to avoid overcrowding, such as social distancing and crowd control","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting reliable information sources, providing job security, and access to healthcare","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrofitting public venues and transport, redesigning city layout to prevent overcrowding","category":"Optimize users flows to monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improved infection control measures and stringent hygiene protocols","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robust testing and contact tracing to identify and isolate infected individuals","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education and enforcement of social distancing
